body:
- Fixed a multiplayer connect crash
- Fixed many various other crashes
- Fixed non-mobile recipes showing up on mobile devices
- Fixed core not being present in editor menu
- Fixed players being sent a generic disconnect instead of a kick message
- Fixed random lines being clipped when near edge of screen
- Fixed players not being removed on disconnect on servers
- Made servers disallow custom clients by default
name: 4.0 Build 43 - Unstable Alpha
